short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to allow users to change the styling for their ChatGPT experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Styler is a Google extension to customize and improve on the existing ChatGPT website.

This extension is built to enhance on ChatGPT's functionality by making it easier for users to view messages by adding in colored messages, matching iMessage and other popular texting softwares. 

Users can change the:
- message widths to take up as much room as they want
- message bubble colors
- message text colors
- corner rounding and padding from the edges
- and more! 

We also have a "scroll-to-top" button enabled just in case you'd like to get back to the top of the conversation thread! 

You can view more information on our GitHub below: 
https://github.com/joseph-w-valdez/chatGPTStyler 

Join our Discord server and give us feedback and suggestions too!
https://discord.gg/QkCyQgWHW5
